body: Hello guys, Exploring the the boundaries of modeling huge buildings with HB, I´m trying to setup a case-study of a sky-rise building that includes plenums. I´m uncertain about how to weave the settings of such a model. I started defining the attributes for each zone by spreading each of them in a branch, yet at one point the attributes started being assigned to the geometry of a single zone (Pics). I added some questions, and some of the limitations I found when generating the model in the file I´m attaching. Any feedback would be appreciated! Alejandro [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5SYuKLMNKFwCKYdZSwA5iU*xwCt37rwO6XWHqgeABdYkS90LsjyoHtgIc3rbSGOgxNNF3FZTcV4lhrj*y4pGGRoLKUP7YmAS/Model1.png)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5SYuKLMNKFzjMkG6kxFKwORxwFLbyngyU3CoovKYGB69yXpLgNy2ilJeYB*Xrc5ZnmObBjJXzSwfOU9U2K30nA5mFp8b3CxU/Model2.png)
topic: Setting up a skyrise with plenums for E+

replies.body: Hi Alejandro, I can't check your file right now but just back to Plenum there is a component that may make part of the process easier for you. Mostapha [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/CE4srWD*11bWyV4eBVNypHCZfRmN2AmYyEFtuWEecH5w31I59E10WdLu70IzRvZtTWELwhDwA8XN9IQCg6oQ8IzVwjjc*SS1/Plenum.jpg)

Hi Mostapha,

In regards to that component, I added it but I was uncertain of when to merge it to the regular zones, if before defining the loads and schedules, or if after...

Thanks
I updated the file (a couple of improvements)
